languages.text: "Это... это ты мне? Это я, по-твоему, "юноша"? И, чтобы ты знал, я оказал честь тому дрянному уродству, когда прикоснулся к нему".

"You— you are addressing me? I am no man, young or otherwise, and I have nothing to learn from mon-keigh homilies. What is more, I honoured that wretched monstrosity you call a throne when I deigned to touch it."
languages.original_text: "Это... это ты мне? Это я, по-твоему, "юноша"? И, чтобы ты знал, я оказал честь тому дрянному уродству, когда прикоснулся к нему".

traits.locale_text: "You— you are addressing me? I am no man, young or otherwise, and I have nothing to learn from mon-keigh homilies. What is more, I honoured that wretched monstrosity you call a throne when I deigned to touch it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You— you are addressing me? I am no man, young or otherwise, and I have nothing to learn from mon-keigh homilies. What is more, I honoured that wretched monstrosity you call a throne when I deigned to touch it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You— you are addressing me? I am no man, young or otherwise, and I have nothing to learn from mon-keigh homilies. What is more, I honoured that wretched monstrosity you call a throne when I deigned to touch it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You— you are addressing me? I am no man, young or otherwise, and I have nothing to learn from mon-keigh homilies. What is more, I honoured that wretched monstrosity you call a throne when I deigned to touch it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你——你是在跟我说话吗？抱歉，先别管我年不年轻，我可不是什么‘人’，更不可能从猴子的说教中得到什么教训。如果我愿意屈尊坐坐你称之为‘王座’的破烂玩意儿，那是它的荣幸。”
languages.original_text: "You— you are addressing me? I am no man, young or otherwise, and I have nothing to learn from mon-keigh homilies. What is more, I honoured that wretched monstrosity you call a throne when I deigned to touch it."

traits.locale_text: “你——你是在跟我说话吗？抱歉，先别管我年不年轻，我可不是什么‘人’，更不可能从猴子的说教中得到什么教训。如果我愿意屈尊坐坐你称之为‘王座’的破烂玩意儿，那是它的荣幸。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « C'est... c'est à moi que vous parlez ? Je ne suis ni un homme, ni jeune, et je n'ai rien à apprendre des mon-keigh. De plus, j'ai fait honneur à la monstruosité que vous appelez un trône quand j'ai daigné le toucher. »
languages.original_text: "You— you are addressing me? I am no man, young or otherwise, and I have nothing to learn from mon-keigh homilies. What is more, I honoured that wretched monstrosity you call a throne when I deigned to touch it."

traits.locale_text: « C'est... c'est à moi que vous parlez ? Je ne suis ni un homme, ni jeune, et je n'ai rien à apprendre des mon-keigh. De plus, j'ai fait honneur à la monstruosité que vous appelez un trône quand j'ai daigné le toucher. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr ... Ihr sprecht mit mir? Ich bin kein Mann, jung oder anderweitig, und ich habe von Moralpredigten eines Chem-Pan-Sey nichts zu lernen. Mehr noch, ich habe diesem abscheulichen Schandfleck, den Ihr Thron nennt, eine große Ehre erwiesen, als ich mich dazu herabgelassen habe, ihn zu berühren."
languages.original_text: "You— you are addressing me? I am no man, young or otherwise, and I have nothing to learn from mon-keigh homilies. What is more, I honoured that wretched monstrosity you call a throne when I deigned to touch it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ... Ihr sprecht mit mir? Ich bin kein Mann, jung oder anderweitig, und ich habe von Moralpredigten eines Chem-Pan-Sey nichts zu lernen. Mehr noch, ich habe diesem abscheulichen Schandfleck, den Ihr Thron nennt, eine große Ehre erwiesen, als ich mich dazu herabgelassen habe, ihn zu berühren."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「き、貴様、俺に言っているのか？俺は若かろうが何だろうが男じゃないし、モン＝ケイの説教から学ぶことは何もない。それに、玉座と呼ばれるあの惨めな怪物に触れたとき、俺は名誉を与えてやったんだ」
languages.original_text: "You— you are addressing me? I am no man, young or otherwise, and I have nothing to learn from mon-keigh homilies. What is more, I honoured that wretched monstrosity you call a throne when I deigned to touch it."

traits.locale_text: 「き、貴様、俺に言っているのか？俺は若かろうが何だろうが男じゃないし、モン＝ケイの説教から学ぶことは何もない。それに、玉座と呼ばれるあの惨めな怪物に触れたとき、俺は名誉を与えてやったんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Me... ¿Me estás hablando a mí? No soy joven, ni siquiera para mi especie, y no tengo nada que aprender de las monsergas mon-keigh. Es más, cuando he tocado esa aberración que llamáis trono la he honrado».
languages.original_text: "You— you are addressing me? I am no man, young or otherwise, and I have nothing to learn from mon-keigh homilies. What is more, I honoured that wretched monstrosity you call a throne when I deigned to touch it."

traits.locale_text: «Me... ¿Me estás hablando a mí? No soy joven, ni siquiera para mi especie, y no tengo nada que aprender de las monsergas mon-keigh. Es más, cuando he tocado esa aberración que llamáis trono la he honrado».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "You— you are addressing me? I am no man, young or otherwise, and I have nothing to learn from mon-keigh homilies. What is more, I honoured that wretched monstrosity you call a throne when I deigned to touch it."

languages.text: "Sen, bana mı diyorsun? Ben ne kanlıyım ne de deli. Ayrıca mon-keigh deyişlerinden öğrenecek bir şeyim de yok. Dahası, o taht dediğiniz zavallı garabete dokunmaya tenezzül ederek şereflendirmiş oldum."
languages.original_text: "You— you are addressing me? I am no man, young or otherwise, and I have nothing to learn from mon-keigh homilies. What is more, I honoured that wretched monstrosity you call a throne when I deigned to touch it."

traits.locale_text: "Sen, bana mı diyorsun? Ben ne kanlıyım ne de deli. Ayrıca mon-keigh deyişlerinden öğrenecek bir şeyim de yok. Dahası, o taht dediğiniz zavallı garabete dokunmaya tenezzül ederek şereflendirmiş oldum."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
